Title: Loans
Description:
Give loans at your own risk!
The most classic type of scam is when someone asks you to lend them money and claim they'll pay you back, but then block you and disappear.

Title: Preview scams
Description:
This is a scam where people take your item for 'preview' but run away after receiving your item.
To prevent this either ask them to pay upfront or refer them to Spiralview.

Title: Unbind scams
Description:
When you're buying bound equipment and they lack energy to unbind, ask for collateral or tell them to ask their friends.
Alternatively suggest to get an unbind/recovery ticket.

Title: Sharking
Description:
This is when a player not only over or underprices, but also misinforms you about the true value or persuades you into a trade where you don't know prices.
Always double check and verify your sources!

Title: False market hype
Description:
Knight A is selling an item 'X'. Later you see Knight B is buying X for more than A is asking. You then decide to buy it from A to resell to B (possibly overpaying).
Then B never shows up again and you end up stuck with X.

Title: Alt accounts
Description:
Most scams are done on alt accounts, while some may also be genuine traders with their own reasons.
Don't go assuming they're all scammers, but do be careful with them.

Title: Reporting scammers
Description:
Take screenshots and report the player to Grey Havens!
If you know they're on discord, please message either The Arcade or Kozma's Backpack mods with proof.
